mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COMPANIES (round, member_id, company_name, registration_number, number_of_employees, establishment_date, revenue, postal_code, address, detail_address, ceo_name, industry_id, status) VALUES (#{round}, #{memberId}, #{companyName}, #{registrationNumber}, #{numberOfEmployees}, #{establishmentDate}, #{revenue}, #{postalCode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{ceoName}, #{industryId}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_COMPANIES t JOIN TB_MEMBERS m ON t.member_id = m.member_id SET t.status = #{statusValue}, m.member_type = 'company' WHERE t.company_id = #{companyId}
